reviewText: It is a bad idea to have loud background music playing during language instruction videos. I could not hear the lecturer because of this loud music, so I have unenrolled. A shame, because I really want to learn Korean.

It was decent but not that great. Lots of errors in the content and even some quizzes are locked (they want you to pay for quizzes and certificate) which is pretty bad since they never mention it until you reach week 5-6. Quizzes from w. 1-4 are available though...

Overall it was good. Just too bad that have to pay for the last 2 modules graded quiz. The lecture notes/textbooks are too simple. Yet, some of the words in the sentences are note explained (which made me confused: like is this part of the grammar or vocab?)Have to write down a lot of notes and look up to the google on certain words especially the whole course not enough of vocab. The module 1-5 last reading article have TOTALLY not module related articles at all. It would be great if replaced with "review" of the modules notes/summary. Overall, the course is very simple and very easy to understand.
I​ liked the course, my only problem was that, especially at the end, a lot of the korean words were mistranslated in the videos/
g​ood course
Los videos de práctica de la unidad 6.4 tienen errores de traducción.  El resto del curso perfecto. GRACIAS.-

There are some english translation errors through out the course but nothing major enough to take away from learning the content. I really liked the speaking parts the most since that is the most important element of learning a language.
the material provided is very easy to understand
This course is fun and simple. We can understand every lesson easily, suitable for the beginners as it should. Thank you to the teacher and crews.
I​ like this course! The explanation was clear and understandable however some practices had shown different grammar with the lesson. But, it's okay. Thank you!

buen curso, algo mas avanzado,  recomiendo aprender el alfabeto coreano a través de otro curso o medio. hay pequeños errores en los subtítulos al ingles por lo tanto ciertas cosas se hacían algo confusas. pero fuera de eso logre aprender mucho.
This course was really good u should also do it they explain so well.

This course really helped me a lot especially from the grammar point of view. I really enjoyed this course while learning basic grammar points and vocabulary.  I would like to thank our professor, "Won-Sook Hyun," for making this course easy and understandable for beginners like me.

No pude realizar los ultimos examenes porque estan bloqueados para quienes no estamos interesados en el certificado pero excelente curso. Claro que necesita complementarse con otros cursos pero el contenido es muy bueno

A really enjoyable course, with pleasant video presentations, useful content, and excellent structure (explaining the unit, illustrating necessary grammar points, providing plentiful practice for consolidation).

Muchas gracias por todo,por el apoyo y todo el conocimiento que brindan a traves de este curso,sería genial si pudieran incluir en cada leccion una lista de nuevo vocabulario.De nuevo muchas gracias,he aprendido mucho y me siento feliz!

This was a very complete course for beginners, I really enjoyed it and I want to continue to expand my knowledge of the Korean language, Thank you all for making this vast amount of amazing Korean language material available.

​I found the course structure extremely helpful for learning Korean as a beginner, particularly grammar points, such as when the same examples are elaborated on. They also provide examples of how the same particle can be used in different ways with example sentences. Good at breaking concepts down. Teaches both casual/informal and formal forms. I would recommend this course for learning Korean grammar!

They made it easier for me to understand each grammar points. Those who have learnt hangeul before can enroll to this course. Totally recommended!

El curso realmente fue muy interesante y útil, pude aprender fácilmente los conceptos del idioma. Los videos son muy fáciles de entender y el material teórico es muy útil.

Me gustó que el curso aparte de enseñar el idioma, te enseña sobre la cultura de Corea, lo básico. Es más avanzado de lo que creí, por lo que recomiendo dominar todo el alfabeto primero o tomar otro curso de nivel básico, de esta manera lo que se enseña aquí será mucho más fácil de internalizar.
